jobDescription: GILLIG LLC is the largest and most dependable manufacturer of Heavy Duty Transit Buses in North America. Our customers are in all 50 states, and include cities, counties, transit districts, universities and major private fleet operators. We are headquartered in Livermore, CA. JOB SUMMARY The Design Engineering Supervisor is a key member of the design engineering leadership team. He/she provides technical and organizational leadership to a team of design engineers, CAD designers, BOM and production support staff for The Driver's Interior (CoE)  This position is responsible for communication to and ongoing management and prioritization of CoE workload and resource planning to ensure program targets are met while improving design quality.
